title: Banner Field Fix Completed Successfully
details:
ISSUE RESOLVED: Fixed the handling of the Obsidian "banner" field in YAML frontmatter to preserve the wiki link syntax '[[gies-banner.png]]' in generated Markdown files.

KEY CHANGES:
1. MarkdownNoteBuilder.cs - Modified to preserve the banner value exactly as specified in the template, including both quotes and brackets
2. YamlHelper.cs - Cleaned up redundant banner post-processing logic
3. Config.json - Fixed metadata template path and vault paths

VERIFICATION:
- Template loading works correctly with proper config paths
- generate-index command outputs banner: '[[gies-banner.png]]' correctly
- Both test and production vault paths verified working
- All tests passing

STATUS: âœ… COMPLETED - No further action needed for banner formatting issue
